content: repeat the following for a total of 6 rounds needle 1 k1tbl p1 k1tbl p3 k1tbl p1 7 times p2 k1tbl p1 repeat on needle 2 bind off loosely in pattern thumb move 12 sts from waste yarn onto needles dividing evenly onto needle 1 and needle 2 pick up 2 additional sts per needle at base of thumb to close the gap 16 sts pm to indicate the beginning of round and join yarn knit for 8 rounds work twisted rib k1tbl p1 for 3 rounds bind off loosely in pattern weave in ends block enjoy 3 lace chart k p ssk k2tog k1tbl yo mb 3 stitch bobble 1 kfbf knit front back front turn 2 p3 turn 3 k3 turn 4 p3 turn 5 k3 6 pass 2nd stitch over 1st repeat 7 continue on in pattern for an easy no-turn bobble https //cocoknits com/blogs/knit- tutorials/how-to-knit-bobbles- without-turning-your-work 4 written chart instructions row 1 ktbl p1 ktbl p3 k10 k2tog yo k1 p3 ktbl p1 3 stitch bobble row 2 ktbl p1 ktbl p3 k9 k2tog k2 yo p3 ktbl p1 row 3 ktbl p1 ktbl p3 k8 k2tog k1 yo k2 p3 ktbl p1 1 kfbf -
